name: Everyday Housing Problem
description:
You got your house stolen by an alien while you were sleeping. But that's nothing surprising to happen in everyday life, isn't it? Just do the business as usual. Chase the UFO and catch the space thief!

Everyday Housing Problem is a puzzle game where you navigate through floating platforms with unusual movement. It has 24 levels in total. It was made for Ludum Dare 47 with theme "stuck in a loop", but took much more than 72 hours to finish.
